FuncDef:
The active ipfpm slot command enables IP FPM license on a board.
The undo active ipfpm slot command disables IP FPM license on a board.
By default, the IP FPM license is disabled for a board.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The active ipfpm slot command enables IP FPM license on a board.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
